comments.body: Hey @assmailklm, this issue looks incomplete. I'll close for now, but feel free to open a new one with more details.

title: Unable to Access postgres.new
body:
I have been trying for days to access `postgres.new` in my Chrome browser, and I have been getting this error in my browser:
```
This site canâ€™t be reached
postgres.new took too long to respond.
Try:

Checking the connection
[Checking the proxy and the firewall](chrome-error://chromewebdata/#buttons)
[Running Windows Network Diagnostics](javascript:diagnoseErrors())
ERR_CONNECTION_TIMED_OUT
```
What do you suggest could be the cause? Thanks
author: Ifeanyi55

comments.body: Hey @Ifeanyi55 thanks for reporting. This is the first I've heard of this - just tried connecting and everything loads on my end. Can you confirm whether or not you are behind any firewalls that might prevent access?
Hi @gregnr , it now works from my end. Turns out my Internet connection was the culprit all along. Thanks!
Good news! Thanks for following up
